text: @NYGovCuomo @PatriciaFahy109 NY is getting 1.9% of its state budget, (approx. $5 billion) for coronavirus expenses. Other states got up to 20% of their budgets... even if they have very few coronavirus cases. NY, with the highest need, got the lowest level of reimbursement in the bill. That must be fixed
